$105).

message.subject: Enron Offsite
message.content:
M3.1. Hi Steve:
[Conventional: salutation]
M3.2. Listed below is the information you will need.
[Inform: information about meeting is below]
Blink2.3
M3.3. If I have left out anything,
please let me know.
[Inform: Steve should tell Shirley if she left out anything]
******************************************************************************
**********
M3.4. Friday, August 18th
M3.5. 2:00 - 4:00 PM Arrival in Denver (two separate flights)
[Inform: date and time of arrival in Denver]
M3.6. Can you arrange for shuttle to pick up? [Y]
[Request-Action: arrange for shuttle to pick up attendees]
Flink3.6
M3.7. 6:30 - 8:00 PM Dinner at the lodge
[Inform: time/place of dinner]
M3.8. Saturday, August 19th
M3.9. We will need a conference room that will hold 12-15 people.
M3.10. from 8:00 AM until 4:00 PM.
[Inform: size of conference room needed on Saturday and time needed]
Blink2.2
M3.11. 8:00 AM Breakfast buffet set up in meeting room
M3.12. 10:00 AM Break - bring in fresh coffee and water
M3.13. 11:30 - 1:00 PM Lunch (lunch buffet in meeting room?)
M3.14. 1:00 PM Meeting resumes
M3.15. 2:30 PM Break - bring in coffee, juice, cokes and water
M3.16. 4:00 PM Meeting ends.
[Inform: more specific agenda for Saturday]
M3.17. We will need an overhead projector and an LCD Projector.
[Inform: projectors needed]
M3.18. We will have dinner somewhere in the village on Saturday night,
any suggestions?
[Request-Information: dinner suggestions]
Flink3.18
M3.19. Sunday, August 20th
M3.20. 8:00 - 11:00 Check out and return to Denver for flight to Houston
[Inform: Sunday agenda]
M3.21. Can you arrange shuttle to Denver? [Y]
[Request-Action: arrange shuttle to Denver]
Flink3.21
******************************************************************************
***********
M3.22. Steve:
[Conventional: salutation]
M3.23. Some of the guys may bring their family (will share the same room)
and stay a couple of days after the meeting ends.
[Inform: some people will bring their families and stay after meeting ends]
M3.24. Is there a problem with
them staying on at the lodge?
[Request-Information: whether families staying at lodge after meeting is a problem]
Flink3.24
M3.25. If not, please let me know how soon you
need to know how long they plan on staying.
[Request-Information: if/by when Steve needs to know how long they will stay]
Flink3.25
M3.26. This is all I can think of right now.
M3.27. If anything else comes up I will let
you
know.
[Inform: Shirley will let Steve know if she thinks of anything else, or if anything comes up]
M3.28. Thanks and have a great day!
[Conventional: thanks, have a great day]
